COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c
STRING: This was the second time that I went to school on a
Monday morning, without touching the mailbox.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x162
STRING: I imagined that my life here in Piova would be over
before I got used to not checking it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178
STRING: I was planning to return to my hometown the moment
the graduation ceremony was over, once we had
completed our recitals.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x198
STRING: So, regardless of what happened, or what didn't
happen, there would be no more letters.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ae
STRING: I wondered if today would have actually been the last
day that I received a letter. It was a feeling of longing,
but one of sentimentality that I felt as I looked at
the mailbox,

COMMANDS.LABEL: 1ae
STRING: and then rushed off to school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x204
STRING: [Chris] “Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23e
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x254
STRING: Her voice was cheerful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x260
STRING: This rehearsal time that I spent with Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26c
STRING: I realized that I had become quite accustomed to this
routine that had formed without my knowing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x282
STRING: The soothing, unique scent of the practice room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28e
STRING: It was not only the scent, but the fact that I knew if I
came here that she would be here, which also soothed
me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a4
STRING: And, the guilt that came with it, also became stronger.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ba
STRING: The letter that never came, and the letter that I never
sent.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c6
STRING: Mondays were depressing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ee
STRING: [Fal] “What's the matter? That look on your face says
you hate Mondays.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30e
STRING: [Chris] “...You could say that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x340
STRING: [Fal] “We gave ourselves a well-deserved rest yesterday;
did it not help?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x360
STRING: [Chris] “I wouldn't say that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x392
STRING: [Fal] “In that case...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a8
STRING: Seeing me half-grimace in response to her, Fal suddenly
closed her mouth when she was preparing to ask me
why.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3be
STRING: Fal had good intuition, or perhaps she was plain smart.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ca
STRING: She may have already realized what was going on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d6
STRING: Fal knew that I had received that farewell letter from
Arie on Sunday, one week ago.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ec
STRING: So, Fal surely thought that something had happened
yesterday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x402
STRING: In actuality, nothing had happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40e
STRING: I didn't receive a letter from Arie, and I didn't write one
to her either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x424
STRING: But, that was what cast an even heavier shadow on my
heart.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44c
STRING: [Fal] “Well, shall we rehearse?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x462
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x494
STRING: [Fal] “If you get absorbed in your practice, you'll be able
to forgot everything, at least while you practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b4
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e6
STRING: [Fal] “...You don't think that will work?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4fc
STRING: [Chris] “Ha-ha. No, you're probably right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51a
STRING: [Fal] “Hehe...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x530
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. And, sorry I've been making you worry
over all these things recently.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x56c
STRING: [Fal] “It's fine, it's a good opportunity to make you
practice, anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x58c
STRING: [Chris] “Right, yes, because I'm always so lazy and never
do a thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5be
STRING: [Fal] “Since you understand, okay! Practice practice
practice! We only have five more days until the recital.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5de
STRING: Spurring us on to practice, Fal clapped her hands
together as if to say “chop chop,” just like my music
room teacher did when I was a child.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5fe
STRING: I did as I was told and set up my Fortelle in its specific
spot, and placed my fingers on the keys.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x614
STRING: I opened up my well-aged score to the first page and
shifted my gaze to Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x62a
STRING: Our eyes met, and we synchronized our breathing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x636
STRING: We both sensed that the other was ready, and that was
the sign that drew out the first note.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x66e
STRING: Once we began performing, my hands moved on their
own, smoothly and fluently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x692
STRING: It wasn't that I wasn't trying, but it felt like the music
was outside of my consciousness, and I was observing it
silently from a distance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a8
STRING: However today, I felt surrounded by something unlike
my usual sense of elation, but heavy and heart
wrenching, and it made me wish the music would never
end.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c8
STRING: Those powerful feelings became music, and it made
both my body and heart tremble.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e2
STRING: Those feelings grew larger as we reached the end of
the song, and along with the song they came to an end.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x712
STRING: Suddenly, I knew that everything was over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x71e
STRING: As if the consciousness that was drawn from my body
had just returned, I was drawn back into reality by the
sound of Fal's voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x758
STRING: [Fal] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x76e
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a0
STRING: [Fal] “I really don't know what to say, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b6
STRING: Fal's gaze darted around the room as if she was
hesitant, and then she continued with a certain
determination.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e8
STRING: [Fal] “The way you played today, it was amazing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7fe
STRING: [Chris] “...Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x814
STRING: It was praise from the heart, I suppose.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x820
STRING: Fal looked at me with eyes that were moist, and even
when I noticed this, she didn't try to avert her gaze.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x852
STRING: [Fal] “I wonder what... Makes us so different?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x868
STRING: With that, Fal suddenly looked away, and went silent
with a look of sadness on her face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x87e
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...? What's the matter? What do you mean,
different?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x89c
STRING: [Fal] “My singing, and your Fortelle.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b2
STRING: [Chris] “I think those two things have always been
completely different...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d0
STRING: [Fal] “Not that. I feel there's something more
fundamentally different.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x908
STRING: We talked about this before,
right?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x92c
STRING: That there was something I was lacking.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x942
STRING: [Chris] “...Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x960
STRING: [Fal] “I can feel that from your Fortelle, Chris. I can't
actually explain it, but... I can feel it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x980
STRING: [Chris] “I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b2
STRING: [Fal] “Something that I don't have, but you do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c8
STRING: Fal whispered, to no one in particular.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d4
STRING: It was then that I realized something so basic and
fundamental.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e0
STRING: [Chris] “I wonder if it's... magic.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa12
STRING: [Fal] “The magic that they say is needed to play the
Fortelle?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa28
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry... That was a ridiculous thing to say. I
mean it's obvious, voice and Fortelle are two completely
different things.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa50
STRING: [Fal] “...Don't you wonder about magic though?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa66
STRING: I tried to change the topic, because I thought what I
had said was ridiculous, but Fal cut me off with a
question instead.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7c
STRING: [Chris] “Why do you wonder about that...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaae
STRING: [Fal] “I learned about this in class, so of course I know
that it hasn't been properly clarified yet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad6
STRING: [Fal] “But, what does it mean to you, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb08
STRING: [Fal] “Is there some kind of... How should I put it? A
sensation? That only Fortelle players can understand?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb28
STRING: [Chris] “No... I think that kind of thing is just something
subconscious.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb3e
STRING: [Chris] “In my case, there was a Fortelle at the music
school that I happened to go to as a child, and it made
a sound when I touched it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb70
STRING: [Fal] “You didn't do, or feel anything special at the time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb90
STRING: [Chris] “I don't recall doing anything special. As for what
I felt... Who knows.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbcc
STRING: [Fal] “So in the end you don't really know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe2
STRING: Seeing Fal smile in a way that showed she had given up,
I started to feel like I had to say something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf8
STRING: Should I talk about what I felt when performing with
Phorni, the groundless certainty I had that magic was an
emotion?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0e
STRING: Either way, it was an issue with no clear answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc1a
STRING: I decided to talk about it, hoping that it might help to
make Fal feel even just a little better.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc30
STRING: [Chris] “But there's an interesting theory about this, one
which I have felt I could relate to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6c
STRING: [Fal] “What kind of theory?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc82
STRING: [Chris] “That magic is an emotion. One of the teachers
talked about it, as if it was just something to chat
about. So, it's not in any textbooks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc8
STRING: [Fal] “An emotion...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf6
STRING: Yes, I've heard this before.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd02
STRING: [Chris] “Anger, joy, sadness. The teacher spoke of it like
it was one of these things.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3e
STRING: [Fal] “In that case, you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd54
STRING: Fal closed her mouth again, showing that she had an
idea of some sort, but then hid it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd86
STRING: [Fal] “So there's just this theory, nothing more.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd9c
STRING: [Chris] “That's right. Nothing more.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb2
STRING: And then I too recalled something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdbe
STRING: The day that I could no longer feel that something
which Fal was lacking. It was like a piece of a puzzle
fitting into place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdde
STRING: She was troubled that day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdea
STRING: And at the same time, she was also saddened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe20
STRING: After a long, long-lasting silence, Fal looked at me with
an expression on her face that I had never seen before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe52
STRING: [Fal] “Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe68
STRING: For a moment, I straightened up at the sight of that
expression.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe90
STRING: [Fal] “Chris, do you feel sad?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea6
STRING: Fal had probably identified correctly the emotion that
had seeped into my Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xebc
STRING: In the same way that I had sensed parting from the way
that Phorni sang.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec8
STRING: [Chris] “...No.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xede
STRING: Barely managing the lie, I took a step back to make
space between us, as we were already standing too
close.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef4
STRING: As if she was pursuing me, Fal took a step forward, and
continued.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf12
STRING: [Fal] “I... If I were...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf28
STRING: We were so close that we could feel each other's
breath on our cheeks, and Fal looked at me with
glistening eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf3e
STRING: I knew that I shouldn't, but I couldn't move.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf4a
STRING: If I was the one to take one more step forward, there
would be no more going back.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf60
STRING: I was dismayed at myself as I was starting to no longer
think that this was a bad idea, but I was swayed by
even stronger emotions.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf94
STRING: Her eyes closed, and the distance between us grew
smaller.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa0
STRING: My hand moved, as if it had a mind of its own, and the
moment that it almost touched her cheek.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xffc
STRING: [Fal] “Ah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1012
STRING: We both murmured at the same moment, and Fal's face
then flushed red as she turned her eyes to the floor.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1044
STRING: [Fal] “U-Um...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x105a
STRING: [Chris] “...Y-Yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1078
STRING: [Fal] “F-Forget about what just happened... Nothing
happened, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x108e
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ae
STRING: Fal hurriedly gathered up her score that had fallen on
the floor, and faced away from me as she brushed it off
with her hands.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c4
STRING: I was still stunned, unable to move.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d2
STRING: If her score hadn't fallen on the floor just now...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e0
STRING: I was sure I would have...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1112
STRING: [Fal] “W-Well then. We still have time until midday, we'd
better keep practicing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1132
STRING: [Chris] “Y-Yeah, sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1164
STRING: [Fal] “Are you hungry? Would you like to eat first?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x117a
STRING: [Chris] “No, I'm alright for now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ac
STRING: [Fal] “Really? Well, if you say so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1204
STRING: The two of us were shaken by what had just happened,
and we were not entirely focused during the practice
we did after that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x121a
STRING: I saw Fal off from the hallway as she headed to work,
and even then my heart rate was higher than usual, and
I was unable to regain my collectedness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x123a
STRING: I felt hesitant to be conscious of, or even speak of these
feelings that were brimming inside my heart.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1250
STRING: I unconsciously murmured the name of another girl, and
almost gasped as I remembered the content of her
letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1266
STRING: Did Arie know that this was going to happen?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1292
STRING: “But I think that someday, the time will come when you
understand your feelings for Falsita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12be
STRING: “When that time comes, if you could forgive me, even
just quietly in your heart, I would be happy.”
